name: Hard Light
description:
Battle for supremacy atop the global leaderboard in Hard Light! In this twin-stick runner, swoop and glide through a procedurally-generated map and collect coins to increase your score while avoiding the flaming wall of death that is always at your heels.

This game was made as an entry to Ludum Dare 50 with the theme "Delay the Inevitable"

CONTROLS

Gamepad is strongly recommended.

  • The ship constantly moves forward in the direction it is facing
  • Use the right stick or arrow keys to change direction
  • Use the left stick or WASD to move directly. Push in the direction you are facing to speed up, push backward to slow down, and push to the sides to strafe.
